property.name: cluster_address
property.description: The IP address and port of the Dask cluster's scheduler.

property.name: tls_ca
property.description: TLS/ SSL settings to access a secured Dask scheduler.

property.name: tls_cert
property.description: TLS/ SSL settings to access a secured Dask scheduler.

property.name: tls_key
property.description: TLS/ SSL settings to access a secured Dask scheduler.
